sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../style/TourDetails.css' import {Container,Row,Col,From,ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' function TourDetails() { const {id} =useParams() const tour = tourData.find(tour=>tour.id===id) //destructure properties from tour object const{photo,title,desc,price,reviews,city,distance,address,maxGroupSize} = tour; const{totalReview,avgRating}= calculateAvgRating(reviews); return ( <>

{title}

{avgRating ===0?null:avgRating} {totalReview === 0?("not rated"):(({reviews?.length}))} {address}
{city} ${price}/per person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}
) } export default TourDetails
